name: The Outlaw Delivery
description:
Val, the outlaw deliver...

Help him prove back to the city that motorcycle couriers aren't useless, even when there's more flying ways to deliver the things to the customer.

"The drones aren't useless. They're just toys." - Val.

"It's impossible to reach some location with the drones, but they cost way less"  - Jenny

"I don't trust on Poogle, they're controlling our minds." - Some Random Hippie

The people have different opinions, prove that drones aren't the perfect solution while you develop a brand new motorcycle club.

Thanks for Playing
